oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jordonia School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1981 March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of Jordonia Elementary School, located at 4247 Cato Road, approximately five miles northwest of downtown Nashville. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jordonia Elementary School (Nashville, Tenn.)
